steps.title: Do so by clicking on the link or typing "www.ezgif.com" in your Web browser.
steps.content: Do so by clicking on the link or typing "www.ezgif.com" in your Web browser.

steps.title: It's near the top of the webpage in the left-center of the toolbar.
steps.content: It's near the top of the webpage in the left-center of the toolbar. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Enter the GIF's URL in the "paste image URL:"
steps.content: Enter the GIF's URL in the "paste image URL:" field. You can also click on Browse button to upload a GIF from your computer. [2] X Research source

steps.title: It's the blue button in the "Animated GIF resizer" section of the webpage.
steps.content: It's the blue button in the "Animated GIF resizer" section of the webpage.

steps.title: In the fields below your uploaded image, you can either:
steps.content: In the fields below your uploaded image, you can either: Enter a width and height in the "New width:" and "New height:" fields (the current width and height are displayed immediately beneath the image); or Enter a percentage by which to increase or reduce the size of the GIF.

steps.title: It's the blue button below the "new size" fields.
steps.content: It's the blue button below the "new size" fields. [3] X Research source The resized image will appear below the Resize it! button in the "Resized image:" section of the webpage.

steps.title: It's on the right side of the toolbar below the resized image.
steps.content: It's on the right side of the toolbar below the resized image. Depending on your browser, if asked, choose to click "Save:" field at the top of the dialog box. [4] X Research source New resized image will be downloaded and saved to default downloads location on your computer.

steps.title: You'll find the newly resized image at this location.
steps.content: You'll find the newly resized image at this location. The resized GIF is now available for use on your computer.
